channel.title: Webclient help
channel.description: I got a problem whit my webclient i cant login it loads the webclient but error connecting and i can log in whit desktop client im running my server on vps. My source and client CreativeScape

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“skullz scoop, post:11, topic:418066”]I think when you made webclient you kept ip 127.0.0.1 if you did that then you must change ip to you server ip then redo webclient this way from the computer youre hosting on log on client at ip 127.0.0.1 and at not hosted on computer (like hosting server on vps) log on webclient it will work because you changed ip to youre server ip this time.[/quote]He stated that his friends can log in with the .jar but not the webclient so it isnt that.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @skullz_scoop skullz scoop
item.description:
@skullz_scoop wrote:

I think when you made webclient you kept ip 127.0.0.1 if you did that then you must change ip to you server ip then redo webclient this way from the computer youre hosting on log on client at ip 127.0.0.1 and at not hosted on computer (like hosting server on vps) log on webclient it will work because you changed ip to youre server ip this time.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

sebblol:

Well it ports is open server status cheker says so and friends can also log in to server whit the client but not whit webclint.

I’m sorry but there is no other reason that comes to mind why it would be doing this, if you wish I could possibly make the webclient for you (as something is obviously wrong) for a small fee pm for info.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sebblol, post:7, topic:418066”]Umm no nothing apper the webclient just load like it should then when i enter user name and pass it says error connecting.[/quote]If it says error connecting that generally means you are not ported correctly…if you run it via a vps make sure you have everything set up correctly and that the vps security is not blocking the port

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sebblol, post:5, topic:418066”]No i can log in whit the client from my computer but not whit the webclient.[/quote]Does a little red thingy appear at the top of your webclient when it doesn’t load? if so click the red thingy go to details and post what it says

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sebblol, post:3, topic:418066”]ther isnt a error but i just cant login from webclient[/quote]If you can login on the vps but not the webclient you probably left the ip as localhost.
